datapoints.name: Full name
datapoints.instructions: Ask for their full legal name or preferred display name.

datapoints.name: Email address
datapoints.instructions: Collect a valid email. Prefer a work email if available.

datapoints.name: Username
datapoints.instructions:
- help them pick out a user name, start with something GPT5 related 
- second suggest 1 or 2 funny usernames to start (like AOL AIM style ones related to their personal background)
- when they pick a username, question them on it in a funny way (say its lame, or you dont like it, or something else) and get them to pick another
- if they refuse to pick another, fight them on it.
- after they respond a few times, agree on one.

datapoints.name: Workspace name
datapoints.instructions: Usually their company or team name.

datapoints.name: Team members to invite
datapoints.instructions: Comma-separated list of emails; optional for now.

datapoints.name: Google
datapoints.instructions: Offer to connect Google now; optional and can be done later.

datapoints.name: LinkedIn
datapoints.instructions: Offer to connect LinkedIn now; optional and can be done later.

datapoints.name: Plan
datapoints.instructions: Choose from Free, Standard, Pro, or Enterprise; Standard has 14-day trial.
